tourBios.curYrHigh: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica for the second time in three years with a share of runner-up honors at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: T34th at Canada's Q-School, earning conditional status on the Mackenzie Tour… Made the cut in two of his seven starts, with a T34 at the National Capital Open as his best finish in August.

2014: Missed the cut in all eight of his starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica… Had joined the Tour as conditional member after a T44 finish at the Sebring, FL Q-School in January.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played college golf at the University of Connecticut, where he was team captain his last two seasons… Named Connecticut High School Player of the Year in 2009 while attending Fairfield Prep, where he was a three-time letter-winner.
tourBios.personal: He also lettered two seasons in swimming while in High School… Favorite pro sports teams are the New York Giants and St. Louis Cardinals... Says his favorite Latin American country is Chile because of the landscape, the people and its culture… Personal motto is “Suave amigo”, which translates to “easy my friend.”… Twitter name is @bhuconn… Instagram name is @realbhughes
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T34th in 2015 at the National Capital Open to Support Our Troops.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T77th in Round 3 Scoring Average on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
